Name: Ending
Effect: Creatures killed with this weapon are instantly decapitated.

Name: Splinter
Effect: Any weapon dice added to a combat roll are considered automatic wins when attacking a plant based creature (Leshens, Nature Dragons) or wooden structures.

Name: Extentable Weapon
Effect: This weapon can shrink to the size of a small weapon, extend up to reach weapon, aswell as any size inbetween. The force of the weapon extending can be used in a variety of way.

Name: Fire Repair and Enhancement
Effect: Weapons repairs in intense fires. If fully repaired and is exposed to increasily intense flames, it will become a higher tier item. Each time it is upgraded, a more intense fire is required upgrade it.

Name: Apparel Storage
Effect: This small mirror can save an outfit the user is wearing. If no outfit is stored inside the user will appear naked in the reflection while holding it. Pressing the mirror while looking into it will swap your apparel between your reflection and what you are currently wearing. This happens in a flash of light, similar to the glare off a mirror. This allows the users to store an outfit inside of the necklace.

Name: Magic Resource Leech
Effect: Sneak attack regain 1 Magic Resource of the user's choice.

Name: Life Leech
Effect: Sneak attacks trigger an Minor Heal to self.

Name: Minor Enhanced Magic Resource
Effect: +2 to magic Resource capacity.

Name: Enhanced Magic Resource
Effect: +4 to magic Resource capacity.

Name: Greatly Enhanced Magic Resource
Effect: +6 to magic Resource capacity.

Name: Gradual Heal
Effect: Minor injuries heal in a short rest. Medium injuries heal durning a long rest. Serious injuries heal over a 24 hour rest. Cannot effect higher tier injuries.

Name: Ariel Assassin
Effect: While performing an aerial attack, gain a +1 to your victory level.

Name: Minor Enhanced Vitality
Effect: Reduce up to 1d6 of total injury penalty dice.

Name: Enhanced Vitality
Effect: Reduce up to 2d6 of total injury penalty dice.

Name: Greatly Enhanced Vitality
Effect: Reduce up to 3d6 of total injury penalty dice.

Name: Enhaned Criticals
Effect: +1 to victory level to melee sneak attacks and melee attacks on incapacitated opponents.

Name: Dragon Sense
Effect: The bearer of this armor gets an uneasy feeling when there are draconic creatures near.

Name: Minor Draconic Element Resistance
Effect: Minor Resitance vs dragon elemental attacks (Dragonfire, Dragontide, Soulfire, ect)

Name: Retractable Shield
Effect: The user can deploy or retract the medium shield at will.

Name: Light Bound
Effect: This weapon is physical light, and can be absorbed and summoned by a those with the Radiance magic skill.

Name: Metal Feeding
Effect: To repair, item can feed on metal. Different amounts result in different levels of repair and time needed to complete these repairs.

Name: Command Asclepius
Effect: By holding and speaking the command word "Asclepius" the user may instruct this Runecraft to perform various simple actions. "Asclepius, turn into a whip, or short spear." or Asclepius, attack those soldiers."

Name: Swordbreaker Blade Catch
Effect: Any weapon that could reasonably be caught in the swordbreaker can be caught with a Lvl 1 victory, entering into Close Quarters combat. The opponent's weapon is usable while bound. Your main hand weapon (Small, Medium, or Large) can be used in this Close Quarters combat scenario.

Name: Indestructible
Effect: This item can't lose durability.

Name: Moonlight Greatsword
Effect: Just by thought, this ancient sword wreathed in moonlight, becoming a greatsword wreathed in moonlight. While active, it's weapon class becomes a greatsword and now additionally deals radiant damage.

Name: Blessing of the Moon
Effect:
+2 INT while the weapon is bound.

While bound to this weapon, gain the following disabling: "I hear the sword whispering its secrets to me, and I must know them"
